Articles.Content:
CF-1 Ã¢â‚¬Å“SylphÃ¢â‚¬Â Mk3

By Volapong.

The battle fairy is back!

"Sylph" is a Compact Multi-role Fighter. The design is more than a year old but I keep updating her. I found her joyful to fly and I hope you enjoy too.

![kdZ73K0.png](http://i.imgur.com/kdZ73K0.png)

![YFO1fpW.png](http://i.imgur.com/YFO1fpW.png)

![H0YSHUW.png](http://i.imgur.com/H0YSHUW.png)

Download: [https://www.dropbox.com/sh/yb1ufy3emq1ewle/AABtucAlV35pelgWEmNH7WH5a?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/yb1ufy3emq1ewle/AABtucAlV35pelgWEmNH7WH5a?dl=0)

///Developments///

This aircraft is first develops as a single-engine racing aircraft. The first prototype was fitted with science equipments.

Mk3 is the first design to successfully implement duo supersonic jet engines.

Mk1: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84881-CF-1-%E2%80%9CSylph%E2%80%9D-the-multi-role-Fighter](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84881-CF-1-%E2%80%9CSylph%E2%80%9D-the-multi-role-Fighter)

///Controls///

0=Toggle engines.

///Electronic Warfare version (EW)///

Support and reconnaissance role. There was a plan to have a 2 dockable UAVs but it was unsuccessful.

![jdwFRd2.png](http://i.imgur.com/jdwFRd2.png)

Download: [https://www.dropbox.com/sh/yb1ufy3emq1ewle/AABtucAlV35pelgWEmNH7WH5a?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/yb1ufy3emq1ewle/AABtucAlV35pelgWEmNH7WH5a?dl=0)

///Controls///

9=Toggle antenna.

0=Toggle engines.

///BDArmory///

![Ud4fTO7.png](http://i.imgur.com/Ud4fTO7.png)

Change loadout to suite your mission or use pre-loaded Subassemblies that I made.

![ApM7wMD.png](http://i.imgur.com/ApM7wMD.png)

Download:

Crafts and Subassemblies:

[https://www.dropbox.com/sh/6k8hmllui31j1oj/AAB_iKrUeexbMROM-Dl9VqULa?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/6k8hmllui31j1oj/AAB_iKrUeexbMROM-Dl9VqULa?dl=0)

///Controls///

1=Next weapon

2=Countermeasure

3=Countermeasure (if applicable)

8=Toogle team

9=Toggle Arm

0=Toggle engines

Feedback

![gencq6j.png](http://i.imgur.com/gencq6j.png)

Help me improve this aircraft by posting reply.
